bride.name: Sarah Johnson
bride.description: Sarah is a kindergarten teacher who loves painting and outdoor adventures. Her smile lights up any room she enters, and her kindness touches everyone around her.

groom.name: Michael Anderson
groom.description: Michael is a software engineer with a passion for music and photography. His warm personality and sense of humor make him the perfect match for Sarah.

timeline.title: First Meeting
timeline.description: We met at a local coffee shop where Michael was working on his laptop and Sarah was grading papers. A spilled coffee led to a conversation that would change our lives forever.

timeline.title: First Date
timeline.description: Our first official date was at the Central Park winter festival. We ice skated (poorly), drank hot chocolate, and talked for hours.

timeline.title: Moving In Together
timeline.description: After a year of dating, we decided to take the next step and move in together. Our little apartment became our first shared home.

timeline.title: The Proposal
timeline.description: Michael proposed during a surprise weekend getaway to the mountains. With fresh snow falling and a beautiful sunset, he got down on one knee.

events.name: Wedding Ceremony
events.description: Join us as we exchange vows in this beautiful historic cathedral.

events.name: Reception Celebration
events.description: Dinner, dancing, and celebration to follow the ceremony.

events.name: Sunday Brunch
events.description: Casual brunch gathering for out-of-town guests and family.

vendors.name: Crystal Clear Photography
vendors.description: Capturing your special moments with artistic flair and attention to detail.

vendors.name: Divine Dining Catering
vendors.description: Exquisite cuisine that combines traditional favorites with modern flair.

vendors.name: Harmony Band
vendors.description: Creating the perfect atmosphere with a mix of classical and contemporary music.

vendors.name: Blooming Beauty Florals
vendors.description: Stunning floral arrangements that bring your wedding vision to life.

rsvpSection.description: We would be honored to have you join us on our special day. Please let us know if you'll be able to attend.

registrySection.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we are registered at the following stores:

wishes.message: Sarah and Michael are truly meant for each other. Their love story is an inspiration to us all.
wishes.author: Emma Thompson

wishes.message: I've known Michael since college, and I've never seen him happier than when he's with Sarah.
wishes.author: James Wilson

wishes.message: Watching their love grow over the years has been beautiful. They complement each other perfectly.
wishes.author: Linda Anderson

bookingSection.title: Book Your Attendance
bookingSection.subtitle: Reserve your place at our special day

additionalInfo.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 30 days before the event
